card1.title: Crystal Encased Roses
card1.description: Timeless beauty captured in crystal. Our long-life roses, preserved for up to 5 years, are elegantly displayed in clear crystal cases. Choose from single, duo, or heart-shaped rose arrangements for a truly magical gift.

card2.title: Wooden Box Rose Collections
card2.description: Luxury meets longevity. Our wooden boxes with acrylic tops showcase 9, 16, or 25 exquisite long-life roses. Each box features a secret drawer filled with delectable chocolates for an extra sweet surprise.
card2.alt: Long-lasting roses in wooden boxes with chocolate drawers

card3.title: Acrylic Box Rose Designs
card3.description: Modern artistry meets floral preservation. Our acrylic boxes feature stunning long-life roses arranged in creative designs like hearts and teddy bears. A contemporary twist on classic flower gifting.
card3.alt: Long-lasting roses in designer acrylic boxes

card4.title: Fresh Flower Bouquets
card4.description: Vibrant and varied, our fresh flower bouquets burst with color and fragrance. Each arrangement is a unique blend of seasonal blooms, perfect for any occasion or to brighten someone's day.

card5.title: Box Flower Arrangements
card5.description: Elegance in every shape. Choose from round, square, or rectangular boxes, each filled with a carefully curated selection of fresh flowers. A sophisticated gift that's sure to impress.
card5.alt: Fresh flowers arranged in stylish boxes

card6.title: Premium Acrylic Flower Displays
card6.description: Showcase nature's beauty. Our premium arrangements feature select fresh flowers displayed in clear acrylic boxes, allowing for a 360-degree view of these stunning botanical creations.
card6.alt: Premium fresh flowers in clear acrylic boxes

card7.title: Leather Bag Floral Ensembles
card7.description: Fashion meets floristry. Our exclusive leather bag designs come filled with an exquisite arrangement of fresh flowers. A truly unique gift that combines style and natural beauty.
card7.alt: Fresh flower arrangements in designer leather bags

card8.title: Vase Flower Collections
card8.description: Timeless elegance in full bloom. Our vase collections feature a diverse mix of fresh flowers, expertly arranged to create stunning centerpieces that will enhance any space.
card8.alt: Fresh flower arrangements in elegant vases
